long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
将 Marketing Cloud 英文页面翻译为中文
ANU Audience Connector (http://audcs.com) is a managed Salesforce package which integrates Salesforce leads and contacts with world's most popular advertising platforms: Google, Facebook, Tencent, QQ, WeChat, Toutiao, Tiktok.
